Q_DESC:
This morning Crazy Doodle wants to jump a little. In a few minutes he will arrive at the point 0. Then he will perform a lot of jumps in such a sequence: 1-jump, 2-jump, 3-jump, 1-jump, 2-jump, 3-jump, 1-jump, and so on.

1-jump means that if Crazy Doodle is at the point x, he will jump to the point x+1.

2-jump means that if Crazy Doodle is at the point x, he will jump to the point x+2.

3-jump means that if Crazy Doodle is at the point x, he will jump to the point x+3.

Before the start Crazy Doodle asks you: will he arrive at the point a after some number of jumps?
Input

The first line contains a single integer a denoting the point Crazy Doodle asks about.
Output

Output yes without a quotes if Crazy Doodle can arrive at point a or no without a quotes otherwise.
